text: William Francis Lee III (born December 28, 1946), nicknamed "Spaceman", is an American former professional baseball left-handed pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for the Boston Red Sox (1969–1978) and Montreal Expos (1979–1982). Lee is known for his counterculture behavior. In May 2016, Lee was chosen by the Liberty Union Party as its nominee for Governor of Vermont in the 2016 election. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Sportspeople from Burbank, California Category:Sportspeople from Vermont Category:Politicians from California Category:Politicians from Vermont
title: Bill Lee (left-handed pitcher)
